Interface TreeDumper

All Known Implementing Classes:
JsonHtmlDumper, JsonSvgDumper, JsonTxtDumper, YamlHtmlDumper, YamlSvgDumper, YamlTxtDumper
public interface TreeDumper
This interface represents the ability to dump the data of JSON-like and YAML-like hierarchical structure in multicolor TEXT-base, HTML-base and SVG-base formats.
The main Object-Oriented Design Pattern that is used in this package is called Visitor and the visited hierarchy is represented by inner-class TreeDumper.Node and its subclasses, where this outer interface TreeDumper is a visitor, that accepts visit-events and walks through the rest of nodes hierarchy in a Depth First Search manner.
Implementations of this interface are responsible for the target logical structure (JSON or YAML) and the target output format (see Target-enum)
See Also:
  • (Wikipedia) Visitor pattern
  • (Baeldung) Visitor Design Pattern in Java
  • (Geeks For Geeks) Visitor design pattern
  • (Digital Ocean) Visitor Design Pattern in Java
